amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that Congress should offset the cost of new spending.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 891 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 38. Record Vote Number: 134.
Amendment SA 891 proposed by Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S4662-4665, S4665; text: CR S4662) To express the sense of the Senate that Congress should offset the cost of new spending.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 891 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 38. Record Vote Number: 134.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 891 proposed by Senator Coburn.
